item.title: Working ::ban & ::ipban?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I kinda messed up my ban command… it doesnt work anymore… any1 have 1 working? Or can you fix it?

Here are mine:

[code] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ban”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
String victim = command.substring(4);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
disconnected = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Users/Joanne Lu/Desktop/FuryScape V2/FuryScape V2/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Also, I need an ipban command so I can add the name to the ipbanned.txt file…

Read full topic
